channel.title: How do you make it so if you click a Chaos Altar, you get Pray exp?
channel.description:
Question is in the title. Need an answer fast! Thanks!!
PS: I did -fedexer-'s Global Object TuT.
EDIT: Why do people look but not post.. It's stupid...

item.title: How do you make it so if you click a Chaos Altar, you get Pray exp?
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

Here it is, detailed:

case 61: //Object: Choas Alter { sendMessage("Text Here"); //send message to the player addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[0]), 7); //Skill: Attack; Change it to 0-21 }

Here’s a list to know what skill is what number

item.title: How do you make it so if you click a Chaos Altar, you get Pray exp?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Ok.
Search case 1531;
Then, press enter twice after the break; and add this:

case ####: { sendMessage("Text."); addSkillXP((Skill XP*playerLevel[Prayer Symbol...]), 0); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make it so if you click a Chaos Altar, you get Pray exp?
item.dc:creator: @BloodyRage BloodyRage
item.description:
@BloodyRage wrote:

Hmm… Whats the chaos altar code? ( right click on it, and the first 1 - 6 numbers. ) eg. 2463[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 08:16:35 PM[/size][hr]Mmk… Well when you get the number. search in Client.java

Code ####:

then add this code.

case ####: { sendMessage("You Yadayadayada."); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[20]), 20); addSkillXP((999999*playerLevel[21]), 21); } break;

Then what Skill, and how much exp.

Read full topic
